TOOLS & SERVICES

Introducing: Series Notifications

We‚Äôre excited to introduce you to the new Series Notification service on Titlewave! You can now easily sign up to receive time-saving notifications of upcoming and top-selling series titles.

PROMOTIONS

Follett Book eFairs

Your Follett Book eFair is waiting! Fall 2024 dates are now available. With our easy-to-use website, you can get your Book eFair up and running in minutes. Available to all PreK-8 schools in the US, our online book fairs include free shipping and hassle-free distribution. Don‚Äôt miss out!

Register Now

MADE FOR YOU

Comprehensive Funding Support

Our funding resources offer comprehensive guides to funding and grant opportunities designed to help educators and administrators make informed and timely decisions.

Learn More

FREE Curation Service

Our certified librarians and licensed teachers research titles for you based on the specifications you provide, giving you more time to ensure that those titles meet the needs of your school community.

Start Here
